about_the_game:
This DLC includes complete set of music composed by Waterplea for Versus Squad. About 20 minutes of vigorous fusion of guitar and electronics that accompanied you in this diorama arena sandbox will now be available to you separately in both lossless and lossy formats.

Track List

  • 01 - Surveillance

  • 02 - Junkyard

  • 03 - Furnace

  • 04 - Bloodshot

  • 05 - Eradication

  • 06 - Ravage

  • 07 - Hypertension

  • 08 - Heat

For more music and info about the composer visit Waterplea's official website

NOTE: The Versus OST will be placed in your Versus Squad folder in the Steam Directory: ...SteamsteamappscommonVersus SquadVersus OST

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
